application_credentials.description:
To be able to log in to Honeywell Lyric the integration requires a client ID and secret. To acquire those, please follow the following steps.

1. Go to the [Honeywell Lyric Developer Apps Dashboard]({developer_dashboard_url}).
1. Sign up for a developer account if you don't have one yet. This is a separate account from your Honeywell account.
1. Log in with your Honeywell Lyric developer account.
1. Go to the **My Apps** section.
1. Press the **CREATE NEW APP** button.
1. Give the application a name of your choice.
1. Set the **Callback URL** to `{redirect_url}`.
1. Save your changes.
1. Copy the **Consumer Key** and paste it here as the **Client ID**, then copy the **Consumer Secret** and paste it here as the **Client Secret**.
